inputPortDescriptors.description: ID of the input image or scene to process. e.g., S1A_IW_GRDH_1SDV_20190313T161522_20190313T161557_026321_02F156_A8A9
inputPortDescriptors.name: image_id

inputPortDescriptors.description: (Optional) AWS Access Key ID to use when downloading the data from AWS Open Data Registry. Note: The account associated with these credentials pays download costs.
inputPortDescriptors.name: aws_access_key_id

inputPortDescriptors.description: (Optional) AWS Secret Access Key to use when downloading the data from AWS Open Data Registry. Note: The account associated with these credentials pays download costs.
inputPortDescriptors.name: aws_secret_access_key

inputPortDescriptors.description: (Optional) AWS Session Token to use when downloading the data from AWS Open Data Registry. Note: The account associated with these credentials pays download costs.
inputPortDescriptors.name: aws_session_token

inputPortDescriptors.description: (Optional) Tiles to download, provided as a comma-delimited string. If not specified, all tiles will be downloaded.
inputPortDescriptors.name: tiles

inputPortDescriptors.description: (Optional) Bands to download, provided as a comma-delimited string. If not specified, all bands will be downloaded.
inputPortDescriptors.name: bands

outputPortDescriptors.description: Directory holding output Sentinel-1 scene in SAFE format.
outputPortDescriptors.name: data

name: s2_compile_archive
description: WARNING: THIS TASK IS EXPERIMENTAL AND HAS NOT BEEN ROBUSTLY TESTED. This task will download a Sentinel-2 image from the Registry of Open Data on AWS (https://registry.opendata.aws/sentinel-2/) and compile it into the SAFE format specification. This format is required for the data to be compatible with the ESA SNAP Toolbox and other ESA standalone tools (e.g., Sen2Cor).
